Package com.qam2.utils

Class FormUtil

java.lang.Object
com.qam2.utils.FormUtil
public abstract class FormUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Provides functions for validating forms. Static functions for validating add and update forms for both Customers and Appointments.

      public FormUtil()

  • Method Details

    • validateTextField

      public static boolean validateTextField​(javafx.scene.control.TextField tf, javafx.scene.control.Label lbl)
      Determine if a given TextField contains a value. If field is empty apply error styles to both the field and its associated label. If field is not empty remove any error styles for both the field and label.
      Parameters:
      tf - The TextField to check.
      lbl - The Label associated with the TextField.
      Returns:
      True if the field contains a value, false otherwise.

    • validateComboBox

      public static boolean validateComboBox​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cb, javafx.scene.control.Label lbl)
      Determine if a given ComboBox has a selected value. If the box has a selected value remove error styles from both the box and the label. If the box does not have a selected value, add error styles to both the box and the label.
      Parameters:
      cb - The ComboBox to check.
      lbl - The Label associated with the ComboBox.
      Returns:
      True if the box has a selected value, false otherwise.
